item.description:
Join us along with folks from the AMA Social Media Team at Jacky's Table in Brighton for the #BIMM Holiday Party. We'll be there to have some fun, celebrate the holidays and talk Internet Marketing, Social Media and what ever else comes up! Bring your questions and we'll have a variety of experts who can probably answer them!

For all the people who took this year's CHALLENGE, we'd love to hear how you did and what you learned.
Please share your experiences and celebrate your successes.

It's been a GREAT 2010 for #BIMM! THANK YOU to everyone who has joined us and attended our events this year. Thanks to all of you! we have really grown rapidly and hopefully we can be a great resource for experts and newbies alike. Planning for next year is underway and we'd LOVE your input! Bring some ideas and join us at Jacky's for a fun night with some crazy internet marketers.
item.name: Holiday Meetup/Tweetup and Q&A session
